markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ornate Tattoo](/Feats.aspx?ID=951) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 13 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Tattoos](/Feats.aspx?ID=938)

</column>

---

You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic. Choose a 1st-level [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell from the same school as your Arcane Tattoos, either a common spell or another to which you have access. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate arcane spell.

<title level="2">Ornate Tattoo leads to...</title>
[Virtue-Forged Tattoos](/Feats.aspx?ID=956)
name: Ornate Tattoo
